    • 方法详细资料

      • showKeyboard

        public static void showKeyboard(EditText editText,
                                boolean delay)

      • showKeyboard

        public static void showKeyboard(EditText editText,
                                int delay)
        针对给定的editText显示软键盘（editText会先获得焦点）. 可以和hideKeyboard(View) 搭配使用，进行键盘的显示隐藏控制。

      • hideKeyboard

        public static boolean hideKeyboard(View view)
        隐藏软键盘 可以和showKeyboard(EditText, boolean)搭配使用，进行键盘的显示隐藏控制。
        参数:
        view - 当前页面上任意一个可用的view

      • setVisibilityEventListener

        public static void setVisibilityEventListener(Activity activity,
                                              QMUIKeyboardHelper.KeyboardVisibilityEventListener listener)
        Set keyboard visibility change event listener.
        参数:
        activity - Activity
        listener - KeyboardVisibilityEventListener

      • isKeyboardVisible

        public static boolean isKeyboardVisible(Activity activity)
        Determine if keyboard is visible
        参数:
        activity - Activity
        返回:
        Whether keyboard is visible or not

      • findKeyboardAreaConsumer

        public static View findKeyboardAreaConsumer(View view)
